CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Acquisition_Status__c, "For Sale"),"For Sale", IF(AND(ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Tip__r.TIP_Status__c,"Closed - Leased (Assumed"),ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"Closed - Cancelled")), "Rehab", IF(AND(Yardi_Rent_Roll__r.Unit_Rental_Type__c= "Residential",Yardi_Rent_Roll__r.Current_Tenant_Status__c= "Applicant" ), "Leased", IF(AND(Yardi_Rent_Roll__r.Unit_Rental_Type__c= "Residential",Yardi_Rent_Roll__r.Current_Tenant_Status__c= "Future" ), "Leased", IF(BEGINS(TEXT(Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Tip__r.TIP_Status__c) , "TIP"),"TIP", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Tip__r.TIP_Status__c ,"HOLD - Abd. Property Notice"),"TIP", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Tip__r.TIP_Status__c ,"HOLD - BK"),"TIP", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Tip__r.TIP_Status__c ,"HOLD - Deed"),"TIP", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Tip__r.TIP_Status__c ,"HOLD - Limbo"),"TIP", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Tip__r.TIP_Status__c ,"HOLD - Do Not Contact"),"TIP", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"Re-key Ready"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"Sent to Locksmith"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"Re-key Complete"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"Front-End Assigned"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"Needs Final Budget"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"Needs Vendors"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"Needs GC"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"GC Awarded"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"Five Day Complete"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"Final Inspection Pass"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"HOLD - BK"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"HOLD - Other"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"HOLD - Utilities"), "Rehab", IF( ISPICKVAL( Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c,"HOLD - Occupied/TIP"), "TIP", IF( Yardi_Rent_Roll__r.Current_Tenant_Status__c = "Current", "Leased", IF( Yardi_Rent_Roll__r.Current_Tenant_Status__c = "Eviction", "Leased", IF( Yardi_Rent_Roll__r.Current_Tenant_Status__c = "Notice", "Leased", IF( Yardi_Rent_Roll__r.Current_Tenant_Status__c = "VACANT", "OTM",
"Not Segmented"))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Future Field 2
